title: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) of Yugioh Card Data
text: vignette provides exploratory data analysis (EDA) Yu-Gi-Oh card data. EDA helps us understand dataset gain insights various aspects Yu-Gi-Oh cards.

title: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) of Yugioh Card Data
text: Yugioh card dataset used analysis contains information different Yugioh cards, including types, attributes, attack points (ATK), defense points (DEF), . Let’s load dataset take look summary statistics:
code: library(yugioh)  ## First check the current version of the database version <- get_yugioh_database_version() #> Yugioh Database Version: 96.76  #>  Last updated on: 2023-06-26 09:09:49  df <- get_all_yugioh_cards()

title: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) of Yugioh Card Data
text: Let’s start exploring distribution different card types dataset.
code: library(ggplot2)  # Plot the distribution of card types card_type_counts <- table(df$type) card_type_counts <- sort(card_type_counts, decreasing = TRUE) distribution = data.frame(card_type = names(card_type_counts), count = card_type_counts)  ggplot(distribution, aes(x = card_type, y = count.Freq)) +   geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = "steelblue") +   xlab("Card Type") +   ylab("Count") +   ggtitle("Distribution of Yugioh Card Types") +    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

title: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) of Yugioh Card Data
code: library(ggplot2)  # Filter rows with non-missing ATK values filtered_df <- df[!is.na(df$atk), ]  # Create a box plot of ATK by card type with rotated x-axis labels ggplot(filtered_df, aes(x = reorder(type, atk), y = atk)) +   geom_boxplot(fill = "steelblue") +   labs(x = "Card Type", y = "ATK") +   ggtitle("Distribution of Attack Points (ATK) by Card Type") +   theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
